1.0.1.name: wordpress/trivian-widget-wp
1.0.1.description:
Trivian Widget plugin for Wordpress is a plugin to show Trivian Widget to any Wordpress Posts or Pages.

Have you ever thought you are smarter than your friends?

Well, don't think - it's time to prove it! Trivian is a new and exciting location-based quiz.

Answer tough questions on places near you, follow your favorite places to stay updated and most importantly: earn more points and cooler badges than your friends ever can! You'll also learn various new things on places that interest you during the quiz.

Features

  • Single Sign-On enabled.
  • Exciting Quiz game with Lifelife support.
  • Reward point and badges.
  • My profile view.
  • Competitive Leaderboard
